name: Perceiver
shortDescription: This project implements DeepMind's new Perceiver Model: General Perception with Iterative Attention in TensorFlow which solves the Transformers Quadratic compute and memory bottleneck.
longDescription: This project implements DeepMind's new Perceiver Model: General Perception with Iterative Attention in TensorFlow which solves the Transformers Quadratic compute and memory bottleneck.
